Syria's new president stresses diplomacy but warns against Israel in UN debut
subhead: On his first appearance at the UN General Assembly, Syria's new president Ahmed al-Sharaa warned that Israeli strikes threaten to destabilize the region, even as he pledged commitment to dialogue and a break from decades of Assad family rule.

title: Why Israel faces no sanctions from international sports bodies, unlike Russia
subhead: Teams, clubs, and athletes from Israel continue to participate in various international competitions, despite mounting calls for their exclusion. Independent United Nations (UN) experts on Tuesday urged FIFA and UEFA to impose sanctions.

title: Milan Fashion Week: Gucci stages Demna's debut
subhead: A palazzo transformed into a movie theater, a short film, and a parade of celebrities: The Florentine fashion house masterfully orchestrated the arrival of its new artistic director on the opening day of the Spring-Summer 2026 women's collections.

title: Displaced residents in southern Lebanon fear return of large-scale war
subhead: Tens of thousands of Lebanese people are still displaced after two months of conflict in the autumn of 2024 between Israel and Hezbollah. Israel launched the offensive on September 23, 2024.

title: Italy's 'anti-vax' movement is galvanized by Kennedy Jr
